F18-1: Upper paper feed unit or LCT lift problem
Lower paper feed unit or LCT lift problem
Transfer corona or toner motor problem
High fuser temperature or bad thermistor
Low fuser temperature or open thermistor
Zero cross. Could be upper tray limit sensor
Communication problem between the machine and ADF
Communication problem between machine and sorter
Sorter guide bar or vibration motor
Upper paper feed unit or LCT jam
Lower paper feed unit or LCT jam
RADF opened during run, or other RADF jam
RADF not opened to remove originals
Original removed during operation of RADF
Original didn`t feed during RADF/RDH operation

Memory card not installed, not formatted to Konica specs, or no machine serial # registered on the memory card.
Bypass was used or attempted during duplex.
